mapper.insert: insert into TstCustomFieldOption (label,value,ordr,fieldId, createTime,deleted,disabled) values (#{label},#{value},#{ordr},#{fieldId}, NOW(),FALSE,FALSE)

insert into TstCustomFieldOption (label,value,ordr,fieldId, createTime,deleted,disabled) values
(#{item.label},#{item.value}, #{item.ordr}, #{fieldId}, NOW(),FALSE,FALSE)
mapper.select:
SELECT o.* FROM TstCustomFieldOption o
WHERE o.fieldId = #{fieldId} AND o.deleted != true AND o.disabled != true
ORDER BY o.ordr ASC

SELECT o.* FROM TstCustomFieldOption o
WHERE o.id = #{id}

SELECT o.* FROM TstCustomFieldOption o
WHERE o.fieldId = #{id} AND o.deleted != true AND o.disabled != true
ORDER BY o.ordr ASC
SELECT * FROM TstCustomFieldOption o WHERE o.ordr < #{ordr} AND o.fieldId = #{fieldId} AND o.deleted != TRUE ORDER BY o.ordr DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM TstCustomFieldOption o WHERE o.ordr > #{ordr} AND o.fieldId = #{fieldId} AND o.deleted != TRUE ORDER BY o.ordr ASC LIMIT 1
